1207.question: What language technologies have been introduced in the past?

4-Table1-1.png: The image does not provide information about the specific language technologies introduced in the past.

1207.answer:
- Font & Keyboard
- Speech-to-Text
- Text-to-Speech
- Text Prediction
- Spell Checker
- Grammar Checker
- Text Search
- Machine Translation
- Voice to Text Search
- Voice to Speech Search
